alert.note: Alert for City of Norfolk (Virginia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Wakefield (Eastern Virginia and Southern Maryland)
info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued June 16 at 5:30PM EDT until June 16 at 9:00PM EDT by NWS Wakefield
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 545 PM EDT FOR ...THE CITY OF NORFOLK AND THE NORTHERN CITY OF VIRGINIA BEACH... At 530 PM EDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from 10 miles south of Cape Charles to near Norfolk International to near Cradock, moving southeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...70 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor damage to vehicles is possible. Expect considerable tree damage. Wind damage is also likely to mobile homes, roofs, and outbuildings. These severe storms will be near... Virginia Beach around 540 PM EDT. Other locations impacted by these severe thunderstorms include Bayside, Oceana, Rudee Heights, Wards Corner, Princess Anne Plaza, North Virginia Beach, Dam Neck, Oceana NAS, Gallups Corner and Macons Corner. TORNADO...POSSIBLE THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...70 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
